user_question: What is the most unusual hotel in the world and what makes it unique?
final_answer: The Icehotel in Jukkasjärvi, Sweden, is one of the most unusual hotels in the world. It is rebuilt every winter entirely from ice and snow, featuring intricate ice sculptures and themed suites.
